title: Shinzou Ningen Casshern (Neo Human Casshan)
synopsis: The brilliant Dr. Azuma created many robots to aid humankind. However, during a thunderstorm his lab was struck by lightning, corrupting the programming of one of his robots, BK-1, who renames himself Braiking Boss and declares that instead of serving mankind, mankind will now serve him! He brings other robots together into an overwhelming army bent on enslaving the human race.
related_anime: ['Time Bokan Oudou Fukko', 'Casshern Sins', 'Casshern: Robot Hunter']
staff: [['Kuri, Ippei', ['Producer']], ['Sasagawa, Hiroshi', ['Director']], ['Tomino, Yoshiyuki', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Watanabe, Takashi', ['Episode Director']]]
